Report.SearchSQL: SELECT slwa.[SoftwareLicenseID] ,slwa.[LicenseName] ,slwa.[LicenseTypeID] ,slwa.[LicenseTypeName] ,slwa.[IsTrueUpLicense] ,slwa.[SoftwareTitleID] ,slwa.[Application] ,sti.[SoftwareTitleVersion] ,sti.[EditionName] ,sti.[FlexeraID] ,sti.SoftwareTitleProductID ,sti.[ProductName] ,slwa.[Purchased] ,slwa.[IsSelected] FROM dbo.[SoftwareLicenseWithApplication] as slwa JOIN dbo.SoftwareTitleInfo as sti on sti.SoftwareTitleID = slwa.SoftwareTitleID
